title: Xuzhou Lakeside Stay Minutes from Han Dynasty Heritage Sites
description: Providing modern comfort to a city of timeless treasures, Crowne Plaza Xuzhou Dalong Lake, an IHG Hotel is a gateway to treasured relics and scintillating streetscapes. Delve into tombs, mausoleums and rich Han dynasty heritage to encounter terracotta warriors and intricate jade artifacts. Round out your adventures with a tranquil treatment at Enoch Touch Spa, delicious delicacies at Han Palace or a soothing stroll around the Dalong Lake, just outside your door.
location_description: Crowne Plaza Xuzhou Dalong Lake, an IHG Hotel
